name: Perfect Apocalypse -The Day After
description:
One month after the massive terrorist attack by the "Cornerstone of the New World", spring is about to arrive. Volt and his friends are finally enjoying their newfound normal, and the time has come for them to start focusing on their own paths.

But then, Volt is put on the international wanted list!

Upon learning the shocking news, Sora and his friends begin to chase after Volt, who is desperately trying to escape...

Another Earth appears in the sky, a dog who claims to be the successor of the "Cornerstone", and the mysterious Shepard. A great plan is in motion.

Volt Steiner's final ordeal.

~~~

This game contains cartoon gore, bifurcated dogs, headless dogs, generally dogs not having a great time!

~~~

This game is the PA series Fan-game and later story of IF-Tetralogy! Play the origin-series here! AND Play the IF-series first game here!

This game  is an apocalyptic dog dating dog your own dogventure fiction game. Trigger warnings include cartoon gore, bifurcated dogs, headless dogs, generally dogs not having a great time. Play at your own discretion!  All musics, Arts and programming by Rawfish. created using Renpy!
